datasets.name: 826bce6d
queryLines: use default;
select distinct claim_no from workspace.default.gold_insights;

datasets.name: 2ab4806a
queryLines:
SELECT DISTINCT policy_no
FROM workspace.default.gold_insights 
where  POLICY_NO =  :parameter

datasets.name: 65e4f964
queryLines:
SELECT
  claim_no,
  claim_date,
  policy_no,
  incident_severity as reported_severity,
  CASE WHEN valid_date = 'NOT VALID' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS valid_policy,
  CASE WHEN reported_severity_check = 'Severity matches the report' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS correct_severity_assessment,
  CASE WHEN valid_amount = 'claim value more than premium' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS approve_claim_amount,
  claim_amount_total,
  claim_amount_injury,
  claim_amount_property,
  claim_amount_vehicle,
  incident_severity AS reported_severity,
  severity AS predicted_severity,
  reported_severity_check,
  valid_amount,
  valid_date
FROM
  workspace.default.gold_insights

datasets.name: ae017805
queryLines: SELECT telematics_latitude, telematics_longitude FROM silver_claim_policy_telematics
where  claim_no = :claim_number

datasets.name: e15095cc
queryLines:
SELECT
  release_funds,
  count(*) AS ctr
FROM
  gold_insights
WHERE
  to_date(claim_date) >= :start_date
  AND to_date(claim_date) <= :end_date
GROUP BY
  release_funds
ORDER BY
  release_funds

datasets.name: 21c61fa4
queryLines: select   count(suspicious_activity) as fraud FROM   gold_insights
where   suspicious_activity = true   and to_date(claim_date) >=  :start_date   and to_date(claim_date) <=  :end_date

datasets.name: c0a7156e
queryLines: select   claim_no,   claim_amount_total,   claim_amount_injury,   claim_amount_property,   claim_amount_vehicle,   to_date(claim_date),   incident_type,   incident_severity,   incident_date,   collision_type,   collision_number_of_vehicles_involved,   driver_age,   driver_insured_relationship,   driver_license_issue_date,   months_as_customer,   number_of_witnesses,   suspicious_activity from   gold_insights
where  claim_no = :claim_number

datasets.name: 04af8c92
queryLines: select   count(*) as expired_policies FROM   gold_insights
where   pol_expiry_date < claim_date   and to_date(claim_date) >=  :start_date   and to_date(claim_date) <=  :end_date

datasets.name: fc32d027
queryLines:
Select   valid_amount,   count(*) as ctr FROM   gold_insights
where   to_date(claim_date) >= :start_date   and to_date(claim_date) <= :end_date
  group by   valid_amount order by   valid_amount desc

datasets.name: 1340437d
queryLines:
select   reported_severity_check,   count(*) as ctr FROM   gold_insights
where   to_date(claim_date) >= :start_date   and to_date(claim_date) <= :end_date
 group by   reported_severity_check order by   reported_severity_check

datasets.name: ab9b9cc9
queryLines: select REPLACE(image_name, '.jpg', '.png')  image_name, image_id FROM silver_accident
where claim_no = :claim_number

datasets.name: 0aa40f53
queryLines:
SELECT
  -- 1. Claim & Severity Details (Incident Core)
  claim_no,
  claim_date,
  incident_date,
  incident_hour,
  incident_type,
  incident_severity,
  reported_severity_check, -- Added for severity mismatch check
  collision_type,
  collision_number_of_vehicles_involved,
  
  -- 2. Vehicle Details
  chassis_no,
  MAKE,
  MODEL,
  BODY,
  MODEL_YEAR,
  USE_OF_VEHICLE,
  
  -- 3. Policy & Customer Details
  policy_no,
  CUST_ID,
  POLICYTYPE,
  pol_issue_date,
  pol_expiry_date,
  sum_insured,
  DEDUCTABLE,
  
  -- 4. Location & Address
  address,
  ZIP_CODE,
  BOROUGH,
  NEIGHBORHOOD,
  
  -- 5. Driver & Behavioral Details
  driver_age,
  DRV_DOB, -- Driver Date of Birth
  driver_insured_relationship,
  driver_license_issue_date,
  months_as_customer,
  number_of_witnesses,
  suspicious_activity,
  
  -- 6. Financial & Fraud Flags
  claim_amount_total,
  claim_amount_injury,
  claim_amount_property,
  claim_amount_vehicle,
  valid_amount, -- Added for claim amount check
  valid_date,   -- Added for policy/claim date check
  release_funds
  
FROM
  gold_insights
WHERE
  claim_no = :claim_number

datasets.name: 6b5b3ad7
queryLines:
SELECT
  -- Policy Identification
  CUST_ID,
  policy_no,
  POLICYTYPE,
  PRODUCT,
  
  -- Policy Dates and Status
  pol_issue_date,
  pol_eff_date,
  pol_expiry_date,
  USE_OF_VEHICLE,
  
  -- Vehicle Specification
  chassis_no,
  MAKE,
  MODEL,
  BODY,
  MODEL_YEAR,
  
  -- Financial Context
  sum_insured,
  DEDUCTABLE
FROM
  gold_insights
WHERE
  claim_no = :claim_number

datasets.name: dbb5489a
queryLines: SELECT   round(c.total_claims / p.total_premium, 2) AS loss_ratio FROM   (     SELECT       round(curr.total_premium, 0) as total_premium     FROM       (         SELECT           sum(premium * months_active) AS total_premium         FROM           (             SELECT               pol_eff_date,               pol_expiry_date,               premium,               round(months_between(pol_expiry_date, pol_eff_date), 0) AS months_active             FROM               silver_policy             WHERE               pol_issue_date BETWEEN :start_date                AND :end_date            )         WHERE           months_active > 0       ) curr       JOIN (         SELECT           sum(premium * months_active) AS total_premium         FROM           (             SELECT               pol_eff_date,               pol_expiry_date,               premium,               round(months_between(pol_expiry_date, pol_eff_date), 0) AS months_active             FROM               silver_policy             WHERE               pol_issue_date BETWEEN date_sub(                 :start_date ,                 datediff(:end_date , :start_date )               )               AND date_sub(                 :end_date ,                 datediff(:end_date , :start_date )               )           )         WHERE           months_active > 0       ) prev   ) p   JOIN (     SELECT       round(curr.total_claims, 0) AS total_claims     FROM       (         SELECT           sum(claim_amount_property) + sum(claim_amount_vehicle) AS total_claims         FROM           silver_claim         WHERE           claim_date BETWEEN :start_date            AND :end_date        ) curr   ) c;

datasets.name: 53617ef5
queryLines: SELECT   round(c.total_claims / p.total_premium, 2) AS loss_ratio FROM   (     SELECT       round(curr.total_premium, 0) as total_premium     FROM       (         SELECT           sum(premium * months_active) AS total_premium         FROM           (             SELECT               pol_eff_date,               pol_expiry_date,               premium,               round(months_between(pol_expiry_date, pol_eff_date), 0) AS months_active             FROM               silver_policy             WHERE               pol_issue_date BETWEEN :start_date                AND :end_date            )         WHERE           months_active > 0       ) curr       JOIN (         SELECT           sum(premium * months_active) AS total_premium         FROM           (             SELECT               pol_eff_date,               pol_expiry_date,               premium,               round(months_between(pol_expiry_date, pol_eff_date), 0) AS months_active             FROM               silver_policy             WHERE               pol_issue_date BETWEEN date_sub(                 :start_date ,                 datediff(:end_date , :start_date )               )               AND date_sub(                 :end_date ,                 datediff(:end_date , :start_date )               )           )         WHERE           months_active > 0       ) prev   ) p   JOIN (     SELECT       round(curr.total_claims, 0) AS total_claims     FROM       (         SELECT           sum(claim_amount_total) AS total_claims         FROM           silver_claim         WHERE           claim_date BETWEEN :start_date            AND :end_date        ) curr   ) c;

datasets.name: eefe948a
queryLines: SELECT   round(c.total_claims / p.total_premium, 2) AS loss_ratio FROM   (     SELECT       round(curr.total_premium, 0) as total_premium     FROM       (         SELECT           sum(premium * months_active) AS total_premium         FROM           (             SELECT               pol_eff_date,               pol_expiry_date,               premium,               round(months_between(pol_expiry_date, pol_eff_date), 0) AS months_active             FROM               silver_policy             WHERE               pol_issue_date BETWEEN :start_date                 AND :end_date             )         WHERE           months_active > 0       ) curr       JOIN (         SELECT           sum(premium * months_active) AS total_premium         FROM           (             SELECT               pol_eff_date,               pol_expiry_date,               premium,               round(months_between(pol_expiry_date, pol_eff_date), 0) AS months_active             FROM               silver_policy             WHERE               pol_issue_date BETWEEN date_sub(                 :start_date  ,                 datediff(:end_date  , :start_date  )               )               AND date_sub(                 :end_date  ,                 datediff(:end_date  , :start_date  )               )           )         WHERE           months_active > 0       ) prev   ) p   JOIN (     SELECT       round(curr.total_claims, 0) AS total_claims     FROM       (         SELECT           sum(claim_amount_injury) AS total_claims         FROM           silver_claim         WHERE           claim_date BETWEEN :start_date             AND :end_date         ) curr   ) c;

datasets.name: 80527ee6
queryLines: select   incident_type,   incident_severity,   count(incident_severity) FROM   gold_insights where   to_date(claim_date) > :start_date   and to_date(claim_date) < :end_date group by   incident_type,   incident_severity

datasets.name: fb20cba8
datasets.displayName: Damage - Property vs Liability vs Event Type
queryLines:
-- Part 1: LIABILITY DAMAGE
SELECT
  'Liability Damage' AS type,
  incident_type,
  SUM(claim_amount_injury) AS amount
FROM
  gold_insights
WHERE
  to_date(claim_date) >= :start_date
  AND to_date(claim_date) <= :end_date
GROUP BY
  type, incident_type -- ADDED incident_type

UNION ALL 

-- Part 2: PROPERTY DAMAGE
SELECT
  'Property Damage' AS type,
  incident_type,
  SUM(claim_amount_property) + SUM(claim_amount_vehicle) AS amount
FROM
  gold_insights
WHERE
  to_date(claim_date) >= :start_date
  AND to_date(claim_date) <= :end_date
GROUP BY
  type, incident_type -- ADDED incident_type

datasets.name: 5c472d4a
queryLines: select   incident_hour,   count(*) as incidents,   sum(claim_amount_injury) as liability_amount,   sum(claim_amount_property) + sum(claim_amount_vehicle) as property_amount from   gold_insights group by   incident_hour order by   incident_hour;

datasets.name: 1edeae34
queryLines: select   driver_age,   count(*) from   gold_insights where   driver_age >= 14   and driver_age < 110 GROUP BY   driver_age order by   driver_age;

datasets.name: fc786418
queryLines:
SELECT
  CAST(latitude AS DOUBLE) AS lat,
  CAST(longitude AS DOUBLE) AS lng,
  * -- Select all other existing columns as well (make sure 'latitude' and 'longitude' are only present once)
FROM
  silver_claim_policy_location;

datasets.name: a2f5c440
queryLines:
SELECT
  COUNT(*) AS incident_count,
  make,
  Cast(CAST(model_year AS Double) as int) model_year
FROM
  gold_insights
GROUP BY
  make,
  model_year
ORDER BY
  model_year;
